import React from 'react'; import "./ImagesGallery.css"; import ModalPopup from './ModalPopup'; import { getUploadImages } from '../../controllers/galleryController'; import { isAuthenticated } from '../../controllers/userController'; class ImagesGallery extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { images: [] } } async componentDidMount() { let usreId = isAuthenticated().user._id; let data = await getUploadImages(usreId); let arrImgs = []; arrImgs[1] = []; arrImgs[2] = []; arrImgs[3] = []; arrImgs[4] = []; if(data.images && data.images.length > 4) { for(let i = 0; i < data.images.length; i+=4) { arrImgs[0] = [...arrImgs[0], data.images[i]]; arrImgs[1] = [...arrImgs[1], data.images[i+1]]; arrImgs[2] = [...arrImgs[2], data.images[i+2]]; arrImgs[3] = [...arrImgs[3], data.images[i+3]]; } } else if(data.images && data.images.length <= 4) { this.setState( {images: data.images} ); } console.log(arrImgs); } render() { return (
{/* {message !== "" && } */}
